properties.description: Expand sales team with 10 new AEs

relationships.target: Expand sales team with 10 new AEs

fulltextMetadata.title: Q4 2024 Investor Update

guidance_description: Expand sales team with 10 new AEs

fulltextMetadata.summary: NextGen AI Solutions demonstrated strong Q4 2024 performance with 45% revenue growth to $12.5M and 52% ARR growth to $48M, while expanding to 450 total customers. The company achieved key product milestones including AI Chat v2.0 launch and SOC 2 certification, while maintaining 18 months of runway. Strategic priorities for Q1 2025 include closing a $30M Series B round and launching the AI Agents product.
